game.title: Quest for Glory
game.objective: Complete all tasks given by the quest giver
game.description: A thrilling adventure awaits you in this mystical land.
game.reward: 100 experience points and a magical artifact

task.objective: Collect the Flower of Life from the Enchanted Forest
task.description: The flower can be found in the heart of the forest, guarded by a fairy.

task.objective: Defeat the Dragon of the Caves
task.description: The dragon has been terrorizing nearby villages, seek it out in its lair.

task.objective: Retrieve the Lost Tome from the Ancient Library
task.description: The tome holds powerful knowledge, but it's guarded by ancient magical traps.
